channel.title: Mono On Ubuntu
channel.description: If anyone knows what Mono is (not Mononucleosis) and has tried it, does it work well on Ubuntu? I will be installing it on my new computer, so if anyone knows...I've used it with SuSE Linux 10.0 before, and it works on that platform. Also, does anyone know how to run Moparscape on Linux? I've tried running the shell script from 3.2, but the windows pops up for a sec, then disappears. If anyone has got it working, please tell me. I think the reason it doesn't work is because it was compiled on a windows platform, and needs to be re-compiled on a Linux platform, but I'm not sure. Thanks.

item.title: Mono On Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

If anyone knows what Mono is (not Mononucleosis) and has tried it, does it work well on Ubuntu? I will be installing it on my new computer, so if anyone knows…I’ve used it with SuSE Linux 10.0 before, and it works on that platform. Also, does anyone know how to run Moparscape on Linux? I’ve tried running the shell script from 3.2, but the windows pops up for a sec, then disappears. If anyone has got it working, please tell me. I think the reason it doesn’t work is because it was compiled on a windows platform, and needs to be re-compiled on a Linux platform, but I’m not sure.
Thanks.
